title: Definition of Mutually Exclusive
text: If A and B are mutually exclusive, then P(A AND $$B)=0$$.

title: Application of Mutual Independence
text: If we let A $$=$$ the member is an advanced swimmer and B $$=$$ the member is an intermediate swimmer, what is P(A AND B)?

title: Application of Mutual Independence
text: Is P(A AND $$B)=0$$? If yes, then they are mutually exclusive; if not, then they are not mutually exclusive.
